name: Ribbontale
description:
A prototype of a Fast-paced 2D action platformer with a grappling mechanic.

Default Controls:

  • Use A and D to move sideways
  • Use Space to Jump
  • Use J to Attack (W and S in conjunction to attack upwards and downwards)
  • Use L to Grapple (W and S in conjunction to grapple upwards and downwards)
  • Use Esc to pause the game

Controls can be rebound in the options menu.

Feedback is very welcome, thank you!
